summary: A configurable graph convolutional network class that builds multi‑layer GCN or GraphSAGE architectures, applies selectable pooling (sum or center) to obtain subgraph embeddings, and optionally incorporates pre‑trained or randomly initialized node embeddings with dropout regularization.
business_intent: Provide a reusable model for learning graph‑level or node‑level representations that can be integrated into downstream machine‑learning pipelines such as classification, regression, or recommendation tasks on graph data.
